tasks.label: MASLIVE: üó∫Ô∏è Set Mapbox token (.env)
tasks.command: read -rsp $'\nColle ton token Mapbox (pk.eyJ1...) puis appuie sur Entr√©e:\n' TOKEN && if [[ -z "$TOKEN" ]]; then echo '‚ùå Token vide, annul√©.'; exit 1; fi && ENV_FILE=/workspaces/MASLIVE/.env && touch "$ENV_FILE" && for VAR in MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN MAPBOX_PUBLIC_TOKEN MAPBOX_TOKEN; do if grep -q "^${VAR}=" "$ENV_FILE"; then sed -i "s|^${VAR}=.*|${VAR}=${TOKEN}|" "$ENV_FILE"; else echo "${VAR}=${TOKEN}" >> "$ENV_FILE"; fi; done && echo '' && echo "‚úÖ Token mis √† jour dans $ENV_FILE" && echo '‚ö†Ô∏è  Ce fichier est dans .gitignore ‚Äî ne pas le committer.'

tasks.command: set -euo pipefail; echo 'command -v chromium:'; command -v chromium || true; echo 'command -v chromium-browser:'; command -v chromium-browser || true; echo 'command -v google-chrome:'; command -v google-chrome || true; echo 'ls -l (/usr/bin/chromium*):'; ls -l /usr/bin/chromium /usr/bin/chromium-browser 2>/dev/null || true; echo 'chromium --version:'; chromium --version 2>/dev/null || true; echo 'chromium-browser --version:'; chromium-browser --version 2>/dev/null || true

tasks.label: MASLIVE: Git commit + push (docs + livraison)
tasks.command:
set -euo pipefail
cd /workspaces/MASLIVE

DOC_FILES="FLOW_BOUTIQUE_COMPTE_ADMIN_GROUPE_PUBLICATION.md DOCUMENTATION_INDEX.md"
CODE_FILES="app/lib/pages/checkout/storex_checkout_stripe.dart app/lib/pages/seller/seller_order_detail_page.dart functions/index.js"

DOC_STATUS=$(git status --porcelain -- $DOC_FILES || true)
if [ -n "$DOC_STATUS" ]; then
  git add $DOC_FILES
  git commit -m "docs(shop): document flow publication boutique"
fi

CODE_STATUS=$(git status --porcelain -- $CODE_FILES || true)
if [ -n "$CODE_STATUS" ]; then
  git add $CODE_FILES
  git commit -m "feat(shop): persist shipping profile + attach shippingAddress to orders"
fi

git push origin main
